other_tests.findings: Marked area of erythema and edema.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT Abdomen/Pelvis with and without contrast
other_tests.findings: The previously described hydroureteronephrosis on the left has resolved. Wall thickening and tethering from the rectosigmoid to sigmoid colon noted, with surrounding inflammatory fat stranding, slightly more prominent compared to the prior study.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Hydroureteronephrosis on the left resolved. Wall thickening slightly more prominent compared to the prior study.
